sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function TradeTerminal() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('spot'); // spot, futures, options const [orderType, setOrderType] = useState('limit'); // limit, market, stop const [side, setSide] = useState('buy'); // buy, sell // Mock data for order book const orderBook = { bids: [ { price: 45000, amount: 0.5, total: 22500 }, { price: 44950, amount: 1.2, total: 53940 }, { price: 44900, amount: 0.8, total: 35920 }, { price: 44850, amount: 1.5, total: 67275 }, { price: 44800, amount: 0.3, total: 13440 }, ], asks: [ { price: 45100, amount: 0.7, total: 31570 }, { price: 45150, amount: 1.0, total: 45150 }, { price: 45200, amount: 0.4, total: 18080 }, { price: 45250, amount: 0.9, total: 40725 }, { price: 45300, amount: 0.6, total: 27180 }, ] }; // Mock data for recent trades const recentTrades = [ { price: 45050, amount: 0.2, time: '12:45:23', side: 'buy' }, { price: 45025, amount: 0.5, time: '12:45:20', side: 'sell' }, { price: 45075, amount: 0.3, time: '12:45:18', side: 'buy' }, { price: 45000, amount: 0.8, time: '12:45:15', side: 'sell' }, { price: 45100, amount: 0.4, time: '12:45:10', side: 'buy' }, ]; return (
{/* Header */}
BTC/USDT
$45,123.45
24h: +2.5%
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Chart Section */}
{/* Chart will be implemented here */}
Trading chart visualization will be implemented here
{/* Order Book and Trading Section */}
{/* Order Book */}
Price (USDT)
Amount (BTC)
Total
{orderBook.asks.map((ask, index) => (
{ask.price.toLocaleString()}
{ask.amount}
{ask.total.toLocaleString()}
))}
45,075.00
{orderBook.bids.map((bid, index) => (
{bid.price.toLocaleString()}
{bid.amount}
{bid.total.toLocaleString()}
))}
{/* Trading Controls */}
{/* Recent Trades */}

Recent Trades

{recentTrades.map((trade, index) => (
{trade.price.toLocaleString()}
{trade.amount}
{trade.time}
))}
); }
